name: Pixel Of The Future! (TIME TRAVEL DEMO)
name_original: Pixel Of The Future! (TIME TRAVEL DEMO)
description:
Pixel Of The Future is a game of arrows and combat, Yeah!. 

HERE IS ALL OF THE COOL CONTROLS!!!

-Have 8 arrow points for a attack, Use spacebar! [You can always not use combat, and just beat the boss with your rhythm skills.]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lc2KQ4w6rBI MUSIC USED!!!

- Use down, up, left, right arrows to show off your rhythm skills!!!

-To pause the game, press K !

COMBAT WILL COME SOON THIS IS ALPHA

-RoboJam Games!

Discord: https://discord.gg/4HNC4fWp

YouTube: Robo Games - YouTube

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RobojamH

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/UityInit
